message.body: I agree that we should be searching for something. The interactive map idea sounds cool. I had a few ideas as well. 1: I think it should start with us all looking at an actual paper map. I'll then very dramatically point to a spot on the map, and then
sounds doable. Maybe u are searching foe 3rd band mate??
Only problem with that is, especially when you see how we look, it might make it too much like the video for Hungry Like The Wolf, by Duran Duran.
Yeah, it's a good idea. I just think it might come across as too similar to that particular video.
my friend suggested we try some third person first person stuff...likenom filming u film an expedition maybe
So like filming from the actor's perspective?
Just thoughts. In that Duran Duran video there are safari guys in the city??

It's all set in Sri Lanka. Some of it in a town/city, other parts in a wilderness setting. The singer has a bit of a safari look going. The rest of the band is looking for the singer, and they find him in the end.

Yeah, it's definitely one of the inspirations for this video idea, so I want to be careful to not rip off their concept too much. But I think this is different. My song is about the reliance on technology, and uses the wild as a metaphor for simply not
Yeah I still haven't listened. Been so busy. Have to check it out asap
